author: pkluegl
msg: removed default markup filter parameter in engine descriptor

author: reschke
msg: Fix invalid UUID URN in Link header (introduced for JCR-2542)

author: pkluegl
msg: removed language support (ide parser and lexer) for RETAINMARKUP, FILTERMARKUP and ISINTAG

author: scottbw
msg: Updated the Browse test widget (twitter) to work with the new simplified template system. Seems to work OK, apart from Search which Twitter can't provide using  the same format as its GET service, which is a bit weird.

author: pkluegl
msg: removed RETAINMARKUP, FILTERMARKUP, ISINTAG since their functionality is not supported anymore. Html handling will be introduced by additional seeders in future.
